title: There was an unexpected error with the login session, Please try again.
body:
Anyone else experiencing this? Any fixes?
League worked fine last night, can't login today. No changes as far as I am aware of.

replies.body:
Hey Keallee,

Were the steps provided by the community helpful? While troubleshooting with other players, some of them mentioned that the X was inaccessible. 

If that was the same in your case, pressing ALT + F4 when you see the error message will also give you access to the Sign Out option.
it doesn't give me that option pressing alt + f4 it just closes and that's it......

I've tried multiple times and it finally showed up. When I pressed alt + f4 and signed out I tried to re-login into League of Legends its does the same thing......

 Riot ide appreciate if you reply soon, would love this bug to be fixed as soon as possible <3{{summoner:7}}
You need to click the x to choose sign out and then relaunch and sign in. Should work
Windows 10 users should click the "L" icon. Hit X, then sign out. Should work after.
Had the same issue, this worked, Thanks!

he is not work guy`s i want a help nw pls 
idk how not any one have a solution to this problem???
just had this problem myself, clicking the x before it errors to sign out and sign back in worked for me
Clicking the X did nothing for me. I was able to get back in the game after reinstalling.  It's back on the old launcher though.
